| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `message` | `message` |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `mode`    | `mode`    | Optional. Specify which of your styleUrls to apply. Defaults to the value of the global Context.mode defined in app.ts. Each "mode" results in a separate component dist file, thus avoiding unused css in component variants. | `string` | `undefined` |
